name: Kansas Baked Beans
author: CPENDERS
summary: Sweet-and-spicy, 3-bean, baked beans. Substitute cayenne pepper for all or some of the chili powder if you like it spicier.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
1 (16 ounce) can butter beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat a skillet over medium heat
Cook the bacon, ground beef, and onion in the skillet until the bacon and ground beef are completely browned, 7 to 10 minutes
Drain any excess fat, and transfer to a casserole dish
Stir the white sugar, brown sugar, ketchup, barbeque sauce, mustard, molasses, chili powder, and black pepper together in a bowl; pour over the bacon mixture
Add the kidney beans, butter beans, and pork and beans; mix thoroughly
Bake in the preheated oven until the liquid thickens, about 1 hour
